The patient started ONC201 at the stipulated dose two weeks after RT ended.

The panobinostat regimen in the companion Phase I/II study (NCT02899715) is 20 mg/m² administered orally twice weekly for 3 weeks followed by a 1‑week break, repeated every 28 days.
